subtitle: Explosion sounds in shallow water
title: Propagation of sound in the ocean.
by_statement: by J. Lamar Worzel and Maurice Ewing. Theory of propagation of explosive sound in shallow water, by C. L. Pekeris. Long-range sound tramsmission, by Maurice Ewing and J. Lamar Worzel.
